page.title: 19PADSTOW REGATTA
page.content: Padstow has had a Regatta for many years and many of the events are long standing.Various races are organised including sailing,single-oar sculling, board-sailing and the fishing boat race.There are also{fun events}like a greasy pole competition to see who can stay on the longest, the best-dressed fishing boat and a raft race.No one sticks to the rules in the{raft race and most competitors end up covered in flour,desperately clinging to their raft which everyone else appears to be trying to overturn.There are competitions for children to draw chalk pictures on slate and catch crabs.Displays are mounted by the local Sea Cadets and Canoe Club, and the highlight of the day is a {simulated rescue}involving Padstow lifeboat,a R.A.F.Nimrod and a R.A.F. helicopter.
